mapper.select: SELECT u.* FROM User u JOIN User_Club uC on uC.user_id=u.id and uC.club_id=#{club_id} and u.user_type='일반회원'
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET user_type = CASE WHEN user_type LIKE '동연' THEN '동연' WHEN user_type LIKE '동아리관리자' THEN '동아리관리자' WHEN user_type LIKE '비회원' THEN '일반회원' WHEN user_type LIKE '일반회원' THEN '비회원' END WHERE id=#{id}
